name: Dear Autumn
description:
This is my third game ever made!

this is my third game made so please don't expect too much!

There is going to be a lot of bugs, poor level design, bad voice acting etc. And sorry if my English is bad, I'm from Sweden and I'm 14 years old but I'm trying as best as I can! :)

Soundtrack Playlist: https://soundcloud.com/voidz999/sets/dearest-autumn?si=864c9ba05ab3409d855bb6ce3...

Controls
  • WASD - Moving 
  • ARROW KEYS - Moving
  • UP ARROW KEY - Jump
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • E KEY - Interact
Gameplay

DISCLAMER: THIS IS GONNA CONTAIN SPOILERS FOR THE WHOLE ENTIRE GAME! DON'T CLICK IF YOU HAVEN'T PLAYED THE GAME YET!
